q: Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer.`` Just get your swagger back,'' Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. That's really what Elgin Baylor did. It helped me out.
